text: Videos are a powerful
and expressive tool for communication,
but creating high quality video content
can be time-consuming and costly.
Amazon Nova Reel is a state-of-the-art
video generation model that makes it easy for you
to create high quality videos for your needs.
It's realistic videos and flexibility
make it an ideal choice
for use cases in advertising and marketing,
and can lower the time, effort,
and cost for video creation and iteration.
Amazon Nova Reel is designed to support
the safe and responsible use of AI.
You can benefit from built-in guardrails
for content moderation and copyright indemnity coverage.
Using simple text and image inputs,
you can create highly custom videos within minutes.
Amazon Ads is already using Amazon Nova Reel
in tools like Video Generator and AI Creative Studio.
Start creating high quality videos today
with Amazon Nova Reel.
